alert.note: Alert for Coachella Valley; San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire; San Diego County Deserts (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued December 19 at 2:28AM PST until December 20 at 8:00AM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM PST THIS MORNING... ...FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 8 AM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures as low as 28 will result in frost formation. * WHERE...San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire, Coachella Valley and San Diego County Deserts. * WHEN...For the Frost Advisory, until 8 AM PST this morning and again overnight until 8 AM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered. *PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. &&

area.areaDesc: Coachella Valley; San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire; San Diego County Deserts
